ygData.subject: Re: Well, the patch is in...
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you there. I just felt that the person who originally posted the question was slapped hard for an honest question. Perhaps he is a brand new
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you there. I just felt that the person who originally posted
the question was slapped hard for an honest question. Perhaps he is a brand
new player and hasn't caught on yet. The reason doesn't matter. I only felt
prompted to reply because of the brusqueness of your response to his
question.

--Telaren


-----Original Message-----
From: <Jesper.Sallander@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 1:57 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Well, the patch is in...


>From: Jesper.Sallander@...

garbage
>pouring through..
>
>Why...why post a complete list of all the patch changes in a ...

>
>Enough said
>
>Dameat
>10th Level Cleric
